resources.string: Specify a value between 0 and 59. The controller will use this value when the engine RPM drops below approximately 500 RPMs.
Specify the Ignition advance used during cranking
Specify a value between 0 and 255. A larger value makes the filter more aggressive.
This configures a software filter in the controller\'s firmware to minimize the effects of electrical noise on the EDIS PIP line
Specify a value between -5 and 5 degrees
Use this value to adjust for minor crank sensor misalignments
This is the splash screen for MegaJolt Android
This is the communications rate in milliseconds
This is a list of bluetooth devices
This is the default BT device
Specify a value between 30 and 100. This will set the maximum value of RPM gauge multiplied by 100.
Specify the maximum RPM gauge value
Specify a value between 30 and 270. This will set the degrees of rotation for the RPM gauge.
Specify the degrees of RPM gauge rotation
Set Total Number Of Tick Marks
Specify a value between 2 and 135. This will set the total number of tick marks for the RPM gauge.
Specify the total number of tick marks for RPM gauge
Specify a value between 2 and 67. This will set the division of major tick marks for the RPM gauge.
Specify the division of major tick marks for the RPM gauge
Specify a value between 5 and 60. This will set the maximum value of the Advance gauge.
Specify the maximum Advance gauge value
Specify a value between 30 and 270. This will set the degrees of rotation for the Advance gauge.
Specify the degrees of Advance gauge rotation
Set Total Number Of Tick Marks
Specify a value between 2 and 135. This will set the total number of tick marks for the Advance gauge.
Specify the total number of tick marks for Advance gauge
Specify a value between 2 and 67. This will set the division of major tick marks for the Advance gauge.
Specify the division of major tick marks for the Advance gauge
Specify a value of 105 for normally aspirated engines or 260 for forced air induction. This will set the maximum value of the Load gauge.
Specify the maximum Advance gauge value
Specify a value between 30 and 270. This will set the degrees of rotation for the Load gauge.
Specify the degrees of Load gauge rotation
Set Total Number Of Tick Marks
Specify a value between 2 and 135. This will set the total number of tick marks for the Load gauge.
Specify the total number of tick marks for Load gauge
Specify a value between 2 and 67. This will set the division of major tick marks for the Load gauge.
Specify the division of major tick marks for the Load gauge
Adjust RPM Threshold for Rev Limit in Gauge View
Adjust Shift Threshold for activation of Shift Light in Gauge View
Commit Map Settings to Flash Memory
